chat_history.message:
Hello,

My iPhone 13 Pro has the above issue:
Except for small flaws at the bottom corners, there are some punctual glass chips on the edges of two of three cameras that can be seen. Such damage poses a risk that the glass may break from there. This does not meet my understanding of the condition 'excellent'.

Thank you for your help,

Dear Backcare,

Unfortunately, our repair team is unable to fix the issue and we do not have any available stocks for replacement. Instead, we have refunded the customer.

Regards,
AS
